Text: O O̩jo̩, lʼumi eju, alu kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ de̩;
Fʼumi gwe̩ hiolo bʼudu kʼu fe̩ te̩,
Todu u chema ada kʼu je̩,
Go, ef udu efe̩ oñ iye-mi chefu mi,
Go, i dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼochochi kʼi dʼef e̩do̩;
Mu hiso̩p du kʼe̩ fʼadure-mi gwe̩ rinyo̩, tak omi afe̩;
Je̩ ñw mi gbo̩ uyo̩ kpai e̩wñ e̩do̩ afu;
O O̩jo̩, fʼe̩do̩ ki de̩ hiolo nyi ñw mi,
E̩ ki dʼumi tinyo̩ bʼeju-we̩ te̩ n,
Dʼuyo̩ ujadu-we̩ dabi wa ñw mi,
E̩gbale̩ tak u nako̩ abo ku ma jʼada o̩na o̩na-we̩,
Mʼumi gba bʼabi e̩bie̩ eje̩ te̩, O O̩jo̩,
Todu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ nyʼuwe̩ eju egba n;
E̩wñ iche̩bo̩ O̩jo̩ chʼafu e̩do̩ ki muda kpu;
E̩ ki chʼe̩nyo̩ ñw Zayo̩n alu ki nyo̩ we̩ eju;
tak uwe̩ ayo̩ ñw e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-o̩kpakpa,
